alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAMOILLE...WEST CENTRAL CALEDONIA...SOUTHWESTERN ORLEANS AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Elmore, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Morrisville, Calais, Morrisville Village, Woodbury, Cabot, Hardwick, East Montpelier, Marshfield Village, Hyde Park, Wolcott, Worcester, Morristown, Cabot Village, Hyde Park Village, Elmore, Walden, Craftsbury, Marshfield, Johnson, and Eden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
